title: Indoor area in the Big C shopping mall

details.locationText: 72 หมู่ 5 ต.วิชิต อ.เมือง, Ek Wanit Uthit Soi 2, Wichit, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand
details.time: Group training, Tournament at weekends, or individual coaching
details.timeHint: The best is to look in there schedule (see image below) and contact the owner via Instagram <Instagram hinterlegen>. If you just go maybe it already full so tell him first
details.level: All levels, good place for intermediate and professionals. Specially in the Tournament 'Master Cup' are very good players
details.text: This place is in a Big C Shopping Mall on the higest floor. I just went there at a Thursday but the tournament was already full. After that I listed me for the 'Master Cup' tournament at Sunday. It was very fun but also very hard. Some players there are professional and really good. I went out in the group phase. Definitly recommended for players that looking for a challenge

details.timeHint: You can rent the place individual with friends or there is a group that meet around 10:00 - 13:00. For the group training the best is to ask in there Telegram<!!!Telegram link!!!> group
details.text: The place is a Sportscenter and contains a gym, a area for badminton and a area for 4 tabletennis tables. The location is easy to find. I made the mistake to just go there and I could'nt find anyone. I highly recommend to join the community telegram chat and ask for a time to play. In the group were around 8 people, we warmed up a while and then we played matches against each other. Was very funny :)

details.locationText: PXMJ+8W9, Ko Pha-ngan, Ko Pha-ngan District, Surat Thani 84280, Thailand
details.timeHint: I could'nt go because I had an accident days before. But I contacted them via Telegram <!!!Telegram link!!!> and after chatting with the owner they wanted to do a tournament. There is no official schedule so you should contact them via Telegram<!!!Telegram link!!!>
details.text: The place is a Sportscenter and contains a gym, a area for badminton and a area for 4 tabletennis tables. The location is easy to find. I made the mistake to just go there and I could'nt find anyone. I highly recommend to join the community telegram chat and ask for a time to play. In the group were around 8 people, we warmed up a while and then we played matches against each other. Was very funny :)

title: Indoor center in a shopping mall

details.locationText: 30 Meralco Ave, Pasig, Metro Manila, Philippines
details.time: Individual coaching, go with a friend or just go there any day around 18:00 / 19:00
details.timeHint: There is no official schedule. You have to just go there or go with a friend. If you just and hope there is someone. I recommend to contact the owner via Facebook<!!!Facebook link!!!>
details.text: The place is in a shopping mall (like all activites in Manila :D) in the first floor. <!!!What is the name he said me??!!!>. I just went there in a weekday around 12:00 but sadly there was only the coach coaching a kid. After waiting a bit there was a local, we played some hours and he is now a really good friend of mine :). Definitly recommended to go here for some relaxed playtime. No tournament here, you organize things yourself

details.locationText: 01 Đ. Nguyễn Thông, phường 9, Quận 3, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
details.time: Very local place. I don't really know. I just went there at afternoon and could play with them. Really strong players
details.timeHint: There is no official schedule. You have to just go there or go with a friend
details.text: I went here spontanically I was in the near and had luck that here were some locals. One of them was really friendly and played with me. After some warmup we play single and double. I must say they all were super good I had no chance at all

details.locationText: 75/1 Nguyễn thi minh khai ( khu sân tennit, 20 8 Không Quân, Phước Hoà, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa, Vietnam
details.time: I just went here on a weekday at 18:00. That was a good time. At this time you can find some locals and play with them
details.timeHint: There is no official schedule. You have to just go there or go with a friend
details.text: Caution: when you make a route from the beach side (south east of nha thrang) google maps will route you through an military area you cannot pass. That was a strange experience :D So just take the Main road and at one point you turn left. Its a bit tricky to find but you will see 2 big tennis courts and when you go through the middle you will find the entry to the tabletennis area. <!!!Make a picture of the route!!!>

details.locationText: 90 Lê Đình Dương, Phước Ninh, Hải Châu, Đà Nẵng 550000, Vietnam
details.time: The best time here to find other players is 18:00 or you book a coach
details.text: I went here one day to ask what time is the best and the next day I went at 18:00. In the ground floor are some kids playing with coaches. On the first floor you can find other adult players you just can play with. There was no player free so the coach played with me

details.locationText: V8FG+F8V, Phường Minh An, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
details.time: The best time here to find other players is 18:00
details.text: That was super fun. Super friendly locals. At both days I went here the coach was playing with me some practices. After that I played some matches with other players. I definitly recommend this place. This place is a bit tricky to find. Have a look at the image with the route <!!!Image with route!!!>

details.locationText: 482H+GWG, Jl. A.M. Sangaji Gonof, Klasaman, Distrik Sorong Timur, Kota Sorong, Papua Bar. 98416, Indonesia
details.time: The best time here to find other players is 18:00
details.timeHint: Be ready to play with some kids :)
details.text: That was super fun. Who thought I will find a place to play in Sorong :O As first I wanted to check out the place to hear what time is the best but I couldnt find the location. The google maps marker is 100 - 200m wrong :( look in the image for the correct route<!!!-IMAGE ROUTE--!!!> Finally I found the place and the guy said 18:00. So I went in the same day and I got surprised by alot of kids starring at me haha. I felt like a superstar. The people were sooo friendly they instantly wanted to play with me. At the end we made alot of pictures together :D

details.locationText: Buduk, Mengwi, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
details.time: Only coach or you bring a friend
details.timeHint: If you take a coach you should contact him via whats app<!!!--ADD WHATS APP-!!>>>
details.text: I just went here but had no luck to find players. The coach said me the best is to contact him via whats app and make some training. Not possible to find here other players to play with. The coach is really friendly and experienced. I can definitly recomment the coaching
